translations: 试用的；缓刑的；实习中的

sentences.sentence: Teachers should have a probationary period of two years.
sentences.translation: 教师应该有两年的试用期。

sentences.sentence: After a six-month probationary period, her position was confirmed.
sentences.translation: 经过六个月的试用期后，她获准正式担任该职。

sentences.sentence: At the end of the probationary period you will become a permanent employee.
sentences.translation: 试用期结束后，你将成为终身雇员。
